import React, { Component } from "react"; import UserService from "../services/UserService"; import AuthService from "../services/AuthService"; import ReactHover from "react-hover"; import { Trigger, Hover } from "react-hover/dist/ReactHover"; class BoardStudentComponent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { id: this.props.match.params.id, user: [], ID: "", userReady: false, selectedFile: null, }; this.userUpdate = this.userUpdate.bind(this); this.getAttachment = this.getAttachment.bind(this); this.cancel = this.cancel.bind(this) } componentDidMount() { const currentUser = AuthService.getCurrentUser(); if (!currentUser) this.setState({ redirect: "/login" }); this.setState({ currentUser: currentUser, userReady: false }); UserService.getUserBoard(currentUser.id).then((res) => { this.setState({ user: res.data }); console.log("user: ", this.state.user.id); }); } userUpdate(id) { this.props.history.push(`/user-update/${id}`); } cancel() { this.props.history.push("/principal/student-list"); } getAttachment() { const filePreviewOption = { followCursor: false, shiftX: 20, shiftY: 0, }; if (this.state.user.id === "add") { return; } else { if (!this.state.user.attachment) { return; } else { const downloadLink = []; for (const [index, value] of this.state.user.attachment .split(",") .entries()) { const initial = value .split(RegExp("%2..*%2F(.*?)alt"))[1] .split(".")[0]; const fileName = initial.replaceAll("%20", " "); //downloadLink.push(
  • {fileName
